name: @primecare/cypress-test
description: Enterprise Cypress Test Suite for PSW App

scripts.cy:smoke: npm run cy:gen && cypress run --env grepTags=@smoke
scripts.cy:security: npm run cy:gen && cypress run --env grepTags=@security
